column1: Temperate deciduous forests contain trees that lose their leaves and are found across Europe and USA. The weather is mild and wet.
column3: This shelf needs filling with beautiful and exotic plants, get out there and save some seeds!

column1: Desert is the driest and hottest of areas. The world's largest desert is the Sahara in North Africa.
column3: Primrose (Primula vulgaris) is native to western and southern Europe, southwest Asia, and northwest Africa. They are frequently found on the side of motorways and railway embankments and are the county flower of Devon, England.

The strawberry hedgehog cactus or Engelmann's hedgehog cactus (Echinocereus engelmannii) is found in the southwestern United States and Mexico, in desert areas. The flowers bloom in April and last longer than those of other cacti.
